summary: INTERACTIVE CHRISTMAS ADVENTURE But Phil, this is not my channel. I'm not even meant to be here. Don't say that Dan. Think about...
caption:
INTERACTIVE CHRISTMAS ADVENTURE
But Phil, this is not my channel. I’m not even meant to be here.
Don’t say that Dan. Think about what you’re doing.
I’m not just saving three lives, I’m saving twenty six. Lioness is pregnant, and I have to save Christmas for everybody.
No!!!

reblog.comment:
INTERACTIVE CHRISTMAS ADVENTURE
But Phil, this is not my channel. I’m not even meant to be here.
Don’t say that Dan. Think about what you’re doing.
I’m not just saving three lives, I’m saving twenty six. Lioness is pregnant, and I have to save Christmas for everybody.
No!!!

Don’t say that Dan. Think about what you’re doing.

No!!!

Don’t say that Dan. Think about what you’re doing.
I’m not just saving three lives, I’m saving twenty six. Lioness is pregnant, and I have to save Christmas for everybody.
No!!!

summary: I’m going to be taking a small break from sketching, but here’s @amazingphil and @danielhowell. I know this is the third sketch...
body: I’m going to be taking a small break from sketching, but here’s @amazingphil and @danielhowell. I know this is the third sketch I’ve done of them recently so I’ll probs be swapping it up soon and maybe drawing some Jacksepticeye fan art when I get back. None the less, Dan and Phil are both AMAZING people, and my sketches definitely don’t do them justice. :)

summary: I couldn't imagine being in Dan or Phil's position and having people trying to force me to date (and a lot more yikes) someone...
question: I couldn't imagine being in Dan or Phil's position and having people trying to force me to date (and a lot more yikes) someone who I've never stated as more than a friend. I know Dan's said differently now, but he never said it was ongoing and either way he explicitly stated he wants to keep it private. It just sucks that no matter what they say or do they're going to be stuck with people shipping them.
answer:
it’s lowkey even worse than that.

imagine how they felt since they were actually dating and had to hide it. it must have seemed like millions of people were analysing their every move and could see through them. can you imagine how fucking stressful that would be?? 

full disclosure i was really into dnp when i was around 12 (2014-2015), and of course i did some very stupid stuff. the difference was i realised what i was doing wrong and grew from it, whereas we’ve got grown ass adults out here making things about ‘phan’ in 2019.

one of the reasons i stopped being involved in the dnp fandom was because how much people at the time made everything about phan. like i remember people always obsessing over the next upload being a coming out video, analysing still frames of videos, and asking about it on livestreams. it went way beyond fanart/fanfic. i really hope it’s not still like this but idk.

tl;dr anon is right let people have a private life you heathens

blog.name: maybeformepersonally
blog.title: This is a Dan and Phil appreciation blog
blog.description: elle - 30s - her/she or they/them pronouns - i like/follow from virtualsilver - my writing tag is #am i writing now and you can also find my fics on AO3 - if you have any questions my askbox is always open! please do not hesitate to ask me to tag anything, i will do it no questions asked

summary: a list of videos i want dan to make now (in no particular order)
title: a list of videos i want dan to make now (in no particular order)
body:
1. reading the creepiest email i ever got (credit to amazingphil for idea)
  2. top five times ‘straight’ men hit on me
  3. we’re moving (again)! goodbye tour and life update*
  4. mental health series: my experience with therapy 
  5. mental health series: storytime: the very bad no good horrible week i forgot to refill my meds (that week in march)
  6. a day in the life in nevada (feat. amazingphil)
  7. any kind of collab with contrapoints (pls mum)
  8. mental health series: mental illness and self-harm** (the importance of self-care and the support of your loved ones)
  9. why identity policing and exclusionary politics are tearing the queer community apart and how to fight it, a video dissertation by me***
  10. we adopted a dog! (not clickbait)
  11. daniel does make-up (feat. a professional make-up artist) OR daniel does drag (feat. a drag queen)
  12. drunk book review series #1: literally any book, idc
  13. storytime: i’m a freak who enjoys going to the dentist (scrape me, daddy)
  14. our list of awkward moments 2: it gets worse (feat. louise)
  15. never have i ever with phil and pj (weird kid edition)****

please feel free to add your own

*i don’t think they’ll want to show their new place bc privacy (which, fair) but they might do a tour of the place they’re leaving, maybe?

**self-harm not merely as physical self-harm but all types, such as not eating or doing things you know will affect you negatively. like, we know dan is affected by hate comments or negativity in response to his videos, which is something that a lot of people are affected by, but which is not often recognised as a potentially serious thing or framed as something to be careful with. i don’t know if dan would ever want to talk about this, but i’d love to see him tackle the subject, and i think it could help a lot of people.

***look. i can dream. this could be the contrapoints collab.

****all the questions are about weird things they did as kids, sex and relationships are not mentioned at any point. we get hilarious and adorable anecdotes of their childhood. phil somehow wins despite having been the weirdest child among the three of them.

blog.description: ❝𝐈'𝐯𝐞 𝐛𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐦𝐲𝐬𝐞𝐥𝐟 𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐛𝐢𝐫𝐭𝐡❞┆𝐬𝐡𝐞 / 𝐡𝐞𝐫 ♡ 𝐬𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐞𝐧 ♡ 𝐚 𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐛𝐥𝐨𝐛
